title: Zesty citrus spice bread
ingredients: ['60ml water', '80ml milk', '90g butter', '2 eggs', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '12 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '550g strong white bread flour', '2 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '50g raisins', '30g sliced almonds']
